en.name: Xuantao Nie
en.bio: A graduate student majoring in facial expression recognition; Java development.
researchAreas: Deep Learning for Facial Expression Recognition
Early Detection of Mild Cognitive Impairment in the Elderly Using Computer Vision

recentProjects.title: Facial Expression Recognition for Alzheimer's Detection
recentProjects.description: A project focusing on using deep learning to detect early signs of Alzheimer's disease from facial expressions.

recentProjects.title: Mobile Health Monitoring App
recentProjects.description: Developing a cost-effective mobile application to monitor the health of the elderly in real-time.

papers.title: Deep Learning Models for Facial Expression Recognition
AI-Based Early Diagnosis of Alzheimer's Disease
